analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/44/0x814c1aea6d67a6a39fea1a341ef2ef8dc1253af0.sol:
	Contract MegaXToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x814c1aea6d67a6a39fea1a341ef2ef8dc1253af0.sol#223)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/44/0x814c1aea6d67a6a39fea1a341ef2ef8dc1253af0.sol#93) is not in mixedCase
